description: Baldur's Gate 3 is a large adventure game modeled after Dungeons and Dragons 5th edition.

v0.1.description:
This is a first workable version of the bg3.apworld. It is not yet recommended to be played, as it only covers the Nautiloid escape.

To be combined with https://github.com/zane31415/BG3ArchipelagoMod/blob/main/Archipelago_9d8340ef-8f94-1397-4634-3297a02800d5.pak

Likely many bugs.

v0.2.description:
Act 1 Overworld completed. Goal of the world is to rescue Halsin by defeating all three goblin leaders.

Recommended balance setting is to only have Act 1 loot randomized, but act 2+3 loot is available if you want.

Playthrough assumes the player:
Will play as Custom Background (not an Origin playthrough)
Will recruit all companions and keep them alive (Minthara does not need to survive).
Will save the three adventurers at the Grove's gate fight.
Will side with the Tieflings and kill the goblins without the raid on the grove.
Will save all the Tiefling children. (Both the thieflings and Arabella).
Will keep Sazza alive.
Will find Withers in the Crypt as opposed to waiting for him in camp.
Will confront Kagha about being in league with the Shadow Druids by finding the note in the Hag's Swamp.
Will rescue the Zhent agents in the cave with the gnolls and will return the treasure chest to the Zhent.

v0.2.1.description:
Added auto-regioning to improve ease of location modifying. There may be a few badly placed locations in the transition, but it'll be easier overall.

Added locations related to HIDDEN flags that I learned work.
Added HAG locations.
Fixed broken subquest locations
Removed some broken items.

v0.2.2.description:
Fixes broken goal send from 0.2.1.
Fixes option clutter in yaml. (regenerate yaml)
Adds sync option in yaml, supported by latest bg3 mod.

v0.3.description:
Full Act 1 playability- Halsin or Wwargaz are the two goal options.

Also fixed Gale's subquests and fixed a few missing location bugs.

Has not had a full playthrough test, consider as alpha

v0.3.1.description:
Fixes broken locations:
Hag quests
Village Lab quests (still need to read the journal calling it a lab, but they should reward now)
Crypt Withers/Plaque
Benryn's Wife
Zhent Caravan

Added some fallbacks:
Killing goblin leaders before rescuing Halsin will reward on talking to Halsin

v0.3.2.description:
Fix Wwargaz goal (if killing him after astral prison)
Add initial support for traps and killsanity. Very experimental.
Remove some broken options in yaml.

v0.3.3.description: Fixed a few locations, Hopefully fixed wwargaz goal goaling too early if you fight him after astral prism.

v0.3.4.description: Fix desync that could cause goal to be set to Halsin accidentally.

v0.3.5.description:
Changes:
Allows questsanity to be turned off
Killsanity populated through Act 1 and with actual names (mostly)
Fixed various location bugs
* Taught Gale the difference between 2 and 3
* Removed some locations that weren't being handled well
* Changed the kill credit on W'wargaz to be goal
* Fixed Tav not recognizing Mayrina in certain paths

Known issues:
I _think_ there might be an issue with Wwargaz goal if killsanity is off. I will need a new mod version to fix this.
There is a bug that duplicates all received ap items when hiring a hireling. Don't hire hirelings. I will need a new mod version to fix this.

v0.3.6.description:
For use with the v0.3.1 BG3 mod.

Fixes duplicate filler items, fixes some location issues.

v0.3.7.description:
For use with the 0.3.2 BG3 Mod.

Changes:
Made later levels take several xp items. Items are currently still called Level Up, but this will change next build.

Checks moved to later spheres:
Plot-Art: Notice Artefact
Shart: Resolve Camp Fight
Grove: Open the Vault
Gale: Fed a Second Item
Gale: Fed a Third Item
Lae'zel: Deal with Patrol
Lae'zel: Learn Creche Location

Checks moved earlier:
Astarion: Learn Vampire

Checks removed entirely:
Everything in the Locket quest
Everything in the Pickpocket quest
The duplicate recruit Karlach checks (She's awesome but she doesn't deserve three checks)

Hopefully fixed checks:
Gnome windmill
Shart wolf dreams/phobia discussion
Kill paladins

Remaining known bugs:
Monster traps are busted and are currently removed from the trap option default list. Will revisit next build.

v0.3.8.description: Minor fixes to 0.3.7 - level logic fixed, Shadowheart backup Rune check fixed. For use with 0.3.2 BG3 mod.

v0.3.9.description: Fix Wwargaz goal (for sure this time)

v0.4.0.description:
Act 2 questsanity and killsanity added, with Myrkul goal.
Multiboss goal added (regenerate template required)

Act 2 is very much a BETA release quality- expect many broken locations as we work towards stability. I would expect killsanity to be mildly more stable than questsanity.

Requires v0.3.3 BG3 mod - https://github.com/zane31415/BG3ArchipelagoMod/releases/tag/v0.3.3

v0.4.1.description:
Mostly fixing bugs from 0.4.0.

Handled BG3 location path from Linux better (thanks Marcello).
Removed the kobolds in barrels from locations.
Added a better backup for Village-Book (picking up the tome should resolve them)
Fixed the Blood of Lathander and the Dawnmaster's Creche checks
Fixed the Sovereign check
Added a check for getting the ring from Bernard
Added a check for the Kuotoa (any path should resolve it)
Fixed the "reload a save" spam
Handled some of the "this event was not handled" events (probably not all of them by any means)
Added Returning Pike to loot

v0.4.2.description:
Fixes monster traps, renames confusing act 2 kill names, removes some broken act 1 quest markers. Adds options for future gameplay options (not implemented yet).

Installation instructions: Download bg3.apworld, double click. Relaunch Archipelago.
